constructor.details: Constructor sets the faucet address and owner

params._faucetAddress: The address of the Faucet contract

executeMetaTransaction(address,uint256,b.details: Execute a meta-transaction to request funds from the faucet

params.nonce: A unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.userAddress: The address of the user requesting funds

getEthSignedMessageHash(bytes32).details: Get the Ethereum signed message hash

getMessageHash(address,uint256).details: Get the message hash for signing

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recover(bytes32,bytes).details: Recover the signer address from a signature

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
